column4: after installing envyNG my desktop looks great. Now after every update with adept etc., I have to invoke envyNG installer to get back my new look. Is it normal? Or is there a procedure I am missing? - like adding another repository which will take care of existing installations?
no, this is a known limitation of envyng. You only have to run the installer after kernel upgrades, though.
What? what do you mean by kernel upgrades? I just click full upgrade almost alternate days and I have to install envyNG again!
